properties.Address: 15658 Alabama 216 Brookwood, AL 35444
properties.Description: Two shelters behind Brookwood Town Hall, next to the baseball fields. Both of these shelters will be open to the public in the event of a tornado warning. Further information can be obtained by contacting the town of Brookwood.

properties.Address: 15150 Highway 11 N., Coaling, AL 35453

properties.Address: 11549 Eisenhower Dr., Coker, AL 35452
